response.overview: Notorious 1990's public access series revolving around monster family; Billy Fleshburger, Moe Beere and Rumplestitchskin as they get by and get back at a society that rejects them.  Watch as Billy and family look for new victims and even accompany a new family member - a geriatric werewolf named Kibbles 'n' Bites.
response.tagline: You'll Have An Entire Seat, But You'll Only Use The Edge!
response.title: My Three Scums Halloween Special
